Home.desc: I've always had a passion for computer science, especially web development, which allows me to express my creativity. I am also very interested in video game development.

About.title: About
About.par1: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering. My interest in computer science began with playing video games and becoming intrigued about how they are created.
About.par2: After majoring in computer science, my attention shifted to web development, where I felt like I was drawing with code.
About.par3: Aside from programming, I have a variety of interests, including drawing, reading, photography, and video games.
About.par4: Here are some of the technologies I've worked with:

list.title: BotsCompete
list.desc: Secure competitve e-learning platform about machine learning challenges.

list.title: E-learning website
list.desc: Front-end of an e-learning website (teacher side).

list.title: Tic Tac Toe
list.desc: A simple JavaScript tic tac toe game.

list.title: Weather application
list.desc: Weather application developed using ReactJS and the Open Weather Map API.

Contact.par: I'm looking for an internship or work-linked training to put the skills I learned in university to use.
Contact.span: You can contact me through email.
